text: Hwang Hui (1363 1452) was a politican and scholar of the Goryeo dynasty and Joseon dynasty. He was the Prime Minister of the Joseon dynasty from 1431 to 1449. ==Related pages== * Maeng Sa-seong * Kim Jong-seo * Choi Yun-deok == References == * Naver.com article (Korean) * Nate Studies (Korean) Category:1363 births Category:1452 deaths Category:Korean politicians
title: Hwang Hui
